title: Easy CD-DA Extractor 16.0.1 Premium Multilang (x32)

Easy CD-DA Extractor supports all popular audio file formats such as 3G2, 3GP, MP1, MP2, MP3, Windows Media Audio (WMA), Ogg Vorbis (OGG), MP4, M4A (AAC and Apple Lossless), AAC, aacPlus (HE-AAC, AAC+, HE-AAC+PS, eAAC+), FLAC, Musepack (MPC), WavPack (WV), WAV, AIFF, MonkeyÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â€žÂ¢s Audio (APE), CUE and M3U. Also, the Nero Digital (Nero AAC) is supported if you have the Nero Burning ROM installed on your computer. Additionally, Easy CD-DA Extractor also supports command line (.exe) encoders.

Easy CD-DA Extractor is compatible with 32-bit and 64-bit Windows and requires Windows 2000 or newer. Easy CD-DA Extractor is Unicode program and includes over 30 languages. Easy CD-DA Extractor supports visual styles of Windows XP, Vista, and Windows 7.
